title: (x) DIGITAL - AV - FOTO stretched sans caps - FF Scala Sans {Geoff}
content:
I am in the process of designing opening times sticker for a camera shop, and it should ideally be with the same font as they already have used. It’s not Futura or Avant Garde, but what? WhatFont couldn’t help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/digital_4436.jpg)
author: mili

comments.content: You could also give [John Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20070105024620/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/storm/john-sans/) a try.
